citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55pm on 01-JUL-
2021. Arrived at facility and contacted the licensee by phone. Licensee stated that she is traveling and is not available for
inspection. The licensee must ensure that a responsible adult is available to accompany an inspector upon inspection
during regular business hours.
End Section

inspection. The licensee must ensure that a responsible adult is available to accompany an inspector upon inspection 
during regular business hours.
